title: BE in season 8
body:
On my main account after season 8 started i got 11k BE.
After i bought some champions i realized i can't get more BE from matches.(like before after u end a match u got some ip)
Can u tell me how can i get BE from matches or if it this possible?

Ty

replies.body: Every time you level up you get champion shards which can be disenchanted into BE
IP has joined heart of gold so you longer get any after matches. You still get Blue Essence the same way you did before, from chests/capsules and disenchanting shards.
